name: Soccer Cars
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys: Drive

A: Boost

Enter: Start Game

Escape: Pause Game

The game was created for GBJAM5 and was inspired by Rocket League and the song I used is called Nintendisco by Popskyy.

Note: I signed out from the ratings of this jam because the music and sound effects were not created during the jam. Coming from Ludum Dare I somehow overlooked the fact that all assets have to be created during the jam. Reading this rule I just thought about graphics. But I'm still happy with the result. :D
